remarks: The integral of a piecewise continuous periodic function ` F ` is unchanged if the domain is shifted by its period ` T ` .  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
statement:
fourierdlem92.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. RR ) $.
fourierdlem92.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. RR ) $.
fourierdlem92.p $e |- P = ( m e. NN |-> { p e. ( RR ^m ( 0 ... m ) ) | ( ( ( p ` 0 ) = A /\ ( p ` m ) = B ) /\ A. i e. ( 0 ..^ m ) ( p ` i ) < ( p ` ( i + 1 ) ) ) } ) $.

fourierdlem92.t $e |- ( ph -> T e. RR ) $.
fourierdlem92.q $e |- ( ph -> Q e. ( P ` M ) ) $.
fourierdlem92.fper $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. ( A [,] B ) ) -> ( F ` ( x + T ) ) = ( F ` x ) ) $.
fourierdlem92.s $e |- S = ( i e. ( 0 ... M ) |-> ( ( Q ` i ) + T ) ) $.
fourierdlem92.h $e |- H = ( m e. NN |-> { p e. ( RR ^m ( 0 ... m ) ) | ( ( ( p ` 0 ) = ( A + T ) /\ ( p ` m ) = ( B + T ) ) /\ A. i e. ( 0 ..^ m ) ( p ` i ) < ( p ` ( i + 1 ) ) ) } ) $.
fourierdlem92.f $e |- ( ph -> F : RR --> CC ) $.
fourierdlem92.cncf $e |- ( ( ph /\ i e. ( 0 ..^ M ) ) -> ( F |` ( ( Q ` i ) (,) ( Q ` ( i + 1 ) ) ) ) e. ( ( ( Q ` i ) (,) ( Q ` ( i + 1 ) ) ) -cn-> CC ) ) $.
fourierdlem92.r $e |- ( ( ph /\ i e. ( 0 ..^ M ) ) -> R e. ( ( F |` ( ( Q ` i ) (,) ( Q ` ( i + 1 ) ) ) ) limCC ( Q ` i ) ) ) $.
fourierdlem92.l $e |- ( ( ph /\ i e. ( 0 ..^ M ) ) -> L e. ( ( F |` ( ( Q ` i ) (,) ( Q ` ( i + 1 ) ) ) ) limCC ( Q ` ( i + 1 ) ) ) ) $.
